isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - ANTILOCK AIR BRAKE SYSTEM WITH TRACTION CONTROL: BENDIX - 9200, 9300 and 9400 - COMPONENT FAILURE - FRONT WHEEL SENSOR

svcproc.title: FRONT WHEEL SENSOR
svcproc.para: If either the right front or left front wheel sensors are inoperative, the traction control system is disabled, however the ABS system is still active. The brake on the wheel with the inoperative sensor will be modulated by the controller, using input from the opposite wheel sensor.
